item.title: How to setup ROS Noetic in WSL through Ubuntu 20.04 Focal
item.description:
Guide for the Robotics class

Scope: to install the environment needed for the labs without having to deal with Docker or dual booting in Ubuntu.

Target: PCs running Windows 10 or up supporting virtualization.

item.title: The dire state of MathML support
item.description: What is the state of MathML in 2023? Can we finally use it and forget about MathJax or Katex for the time being?

item.title: Static Preload
item.description: A simple method to calculate the static preload in a lumped body multi Degrees of Freedom system

item.title: The unrequested GIF
item.description: While developing my GIF shortcode for Hugo I stumbled upon a weird behaviour from various browsers.

item.title: Enable DoH when Chrome is managed
item.description: For whatever reason your browser is locked out from changing the DoH settings? Here is how to change the settings if you have admin permissions.

item.title: Hugo rendering: Github Pages vs Netlify vs Cloudflare Pages
item.description: Given the various choices of hosting for your static files you may be unsure which one to pick. These are the features and performances of the top three services with their free tier.
